recipes.Name: Smoked mackerel & leek hash with horseradish

recipes.Name: Peanut butter & jam flapjacks

recipes.Name: Smoked salmon & spinach gratin

recipes.Name: Garlic chicken parcels

recipes.Name: Chorizo & pea risotto

recipes.Name: Miso mushroom & tofu noodle soup

recipes.Name: White fish with sesame noodles

recipes.Name: Curried cauliflower & lentil soup

recipes.Name: Red pepper linguine

recipes.Name: Ultimate chorizo ciabatta

recipes.Name: Jerk prawn & coconut rice bowls
Ingredients: 400g can kidney beans in chilli sauce

recipes.Name: Blackened salmon fajitas

recipes.Name: Mary Cadogan's salmon with a cheesy crunch crust

recipes.Name: Asparagus cream pasta

recipes.Name: Cheese & chilli melts
Ingredients: 1 green or red chilli , deseeded and finely chopped

recipes.Name: Cheesy mushroom omelette
Ingredients: handful button or chestnut mushrooms, sliced

recipes.Name: Muddled potato & mozzarella tortilla
Ingredients: 2 x 400g packs ready-roasted potatoes  (available with different flavourings from most supermarkets)

recipes.Name: Sausages with quick onion gravy & sweet potato chips
Ingredients: 2large orange  sweet potatoes about 800g/1¾lb total weight

recipes.Name: Warm chicken noodle salad

recipes.Name: Ajo blanco

recipes.Name: Pan-fried camembert sandwich
Ingredients: a few drops of balsamic vinegar

recipes.Name: Steak & caramelised onion sandwich

recipes.Name: Sweet potatoes with mushrooms & rosemary
Ingredients: 1 tsp chopped fresh rosemary  or ½ tsp dried

recipes.Name: Sizzled sausage pasta
Ingredients: 4 tbsp oil  from the sun-dried tomato jar

recipes.Name: Squash & coconut curry
Ingredients: 1 large butternut squash  (600g/1lb 5oz peeled weight), chopped into medium size chunks

recipes.Name: Plaice in a hot vinaigrette
Ingredients: 2 leeks , washed, trimmed and shredded into very thin strips

recipes.Name: Moroccan lamb

recipes.Name: Easy butter chicken

recipes.Name: Sweet & sour chicken

recipes.Name: Katsu curry

recipes.Name: Sweet and sour chicken
Ingredients: 8 skinless, boneless chicken thighs , fat trimmed, sliced

recipes.Name: Salt and pepper chicken
Ingredients: 1 tsp Sichuan peppercorns (use normal peppercorns if you can't find these)

recipes.Name: The big double cheeseburger & secret sauce
Ingredients: small wedge of iceberg lettuce, finely shredded

recipes.Name: Easy pad Thai

recipes.Name: Pizza Margherita in 4 easy steps

recipes.Name: Cardamom butter chicken

recipes.Name: Beef & Guinness stew with bacon dumplings
Ingredients: 1kg boneless beef shin, cut into 3cm chunks
4 medium carrots, chopped to the same size as the shallots
3 celery sticks, cut into bite-sized chunks
buttered cabbage and mash, to serve
small pack parsley, leaves picked and finely chopped

recipes.Name: Next level mac 'n' cheese
Ingredients: 80g butter , plus extra for tossing through the pasta
700g extra mature cheddar , 500g coarsely grated, 200g chopped into small chunks
splash of malt, cider or red wine vinegar

recipes.Name: Hunter’s chicken
Ingredients: 1 tbsp vegetable oil, plus extra for the tray
½ pack runner beans, ends trimmed

recipes.Name: Steak & chips pie
Ingredients: 2 tbsp sunflower oil , plus extra for the dish
750g-1kg braising steak  (or topside) sliced into 6 thin steaks (buy a joint and do it yourself if you can’t find any already sliced)
1 tsp treacle , sugar or golden caster sugar
2 beef stock cubes diluted in 600ml hot water
small bunch thyme , half of the leaves picked for the pastry and reserved
thyme leaves , from the bunch used for the beef

recipes.Name: The big double cheeseburger & secret sauce
Ingredients: small wedge of iceberg lettuce, finely shredded
2 slices of mild  cheddar or burger cheese
1 tsp pickle relish or finely chopped gherkin

recipes.Name: Slow cooker pork casserole
Ingredients: 4 pork shoulder steaks (about 750g), cut into large chunks
bundle of woody herbs (bouquet garni) – we used 2 bay leaves, 3 sage leaves and 4 thyme sprigs, plus a few thyme leaves to serve

recipes.Name: Pear & berry pie
Ingredients: custard , cream or ice cream, to serve
3 small pears , peeled cored and halved
3-4 small  pears , peeled cored and chopped

recipes.Name: Next level steak & ale pie
Ingredients: 100g smoked bacon lardons or smoked bacon, chopped
1kg beef shin, cut into large chunks
3 carrots, peeled and cut into large chunks
1 tsp malt or red wine vinegar
600ml beef stock made from 2 stock cubes
few thyme sprigs, stalks and leaves separated
700g plain flour, plus extra for dusting
150g butter, plus extra for the dish

recipes.Name: Smoky spiced veggie rice
Ingredients: 400g can kidney beans , drained and rinsed
1 tbsp red wine vinegar (vegan varieties are readily available)

recipes.Name: Lamb & Dauphinoise hotpot
Ingredients: 3 large carrots , cut into large chunks
1 shoulder of lamb on the bone, about 2.5kg

recipes.Name: Melty cheese & potato pie
Ingredients: 750g floury potatoes (such as King Edwards), sliced
2 x 375g  blocks of all-butter puff pastry
500g chicory (I used red and white for colour contrast), leaves separated

recipes.Name: Coconut, rum & raisin rice pudding
Ingredients: 300ml double cream , plus a little extra

recipes.Name: Treacle apple pudding
Ingredients: 2-3  Bramley apples , peeled, cored and chopped (about 250g flesh)
1 tangy eating apple , such as Braeburn

recipes.Name: Cheesy leek & bacon pasta
Ingredients: 100g herb & garlic soft cheese (we used Boursin)

recipes.Name: Masala chicken pie
Ingredients: 2 tsp black or brown mustard seed
2 tsp white or  red wine vinegar
150ml light  coconut milk (buy a 400ml can- you'll need more for the topping)
1 large red pepper , deseeded and cut into large chunks
1 large green pepper , deseeded and cut into large chunks
½ a small bunch coriander , leaves roughly chopped, stalks reserved (see below)
1 ½kg floury potato , cut into very large chunks
stalks from ½ a small bunch coriander , finely chopped
1 tsp kalonji seeds (also known as nigella or onion seeds )

recipes.Name: One-pot sausage casserole with garlic breadcrumbs
Ingredients: 3 tbsp olive oil, plus an extra drizzle (optional)
400g can butter beans, drained but not rinsed
handful of parsley leaves, roughly chopped

recipes.Name: Chicken & leek mini pies
Ingredients: 200g cooked chicken , torn or cut into bite-sized chunks)

recipes.Name: Satay chicken noodle soup with squash
Ingredients: ½ small squash or pumpkin (about 300g), deseeded and sliced (no need to peel)
3 garlic cloves , crushed, or 1 tbsp garlic purée
thumb-sized piece of ginger , crushed or 1 tbsp ginger purée
1 chicken stock cube or 1 tbsp concentrated liquid stock
3 bird’s-eye chilli , 2 pierced a few times but left whole, 1 finely sliced to serve (optional)
3 tbsp peanut butter , smooth or crunchy is fine
2 limes , plus extra wedges to serve

recipes.Name: IPA treacle tart
Ingredients: 250g plain flour , plus extra for dusting
100ml red IPA  (we used Siren Liquid Mistress)

recipes.Name: Bombay potato omelette
Ingredients: 1 medium cooked potato (leftover boiled or roasted potatoes are fine), cubed

recipes.Name: Next level chilli con carne
Ingredients: 1 ½kg braising steak, cut into 4cm cubes – meat from the brisket, short rib, blade or chuck steak are all good
2 tbsp semolina, polenta or Mexican masa flour
400g can kidney beans, drained but not rinsed (optional)

recipes.Name: Chorizo bean burgers
Ingredients: 3 pork sausages , squeezed from their skins
1 tbsp lime juice , plus wedges to serve
½ x 400g can mixed beans , drained and rinsed
1 ½ tbsp olive oil , plus extra to drizzle
soured cream, avocado, small handful rocket and  chips , to serve (optional)

recipes.Name: Arroz al horno (baked rice)
Ingredients: 2 tbsp extra virgin olive oil , plus extra to serve
800g thick pork belly pork slices (about 8-10 slices), halved
2 red peppers , halved, deseeded and sliced
½ x 400g can white beans , drained (you can use haricot, butter beans or cannellini)

recipes.Name: Next level fish pie
Ingredients: 400g shell-on raw prawns , peeled, heads and shells kept for stock
400g smoked haddock , skinned and trimmed (reserve these), flesh diced into large chunks
1 tsp vegetable bouillon powder or 1 vegetable stock cube
400g skinless white fish fillet, diced into large chunks
200g salmon fillet, diced into large chunks
2 tbsp capers , drained and finely chopped
spinach , peas or watercress, to serve

recipes.Name: Guinea fowl tagine with chickpeas, squash & apricots
Ingredients: 2 guinea fowl , jointed like a chicken (ask your butcher to do this or see our video on how to joint a chicken, in 'Try', below)
1 butternut squash or small pumpkin, peeled, deseeded and cut into large chunks
large pinch of  saffron , soaked in 1 tbsp boiling water

recipes.Name: Butternut macaroni cheese
Ingredients: 1 large butternut squash , peeled and cut into 2.5cm/1in chunks
200g extra-mature cheddar or vegetarian alternative, grated

recipes.Name: Pork noodle stir-fry
Ingredients: thumb-sized piece ginger, peeled and chopped, or 1½ tbsp ginger purée
3 garlic cloves, crushed, or 1 tbsp garlic purée
320g stir-fry veg (we used 2 x 160g bags of mangetout, baby sweetcorn, beansprouts, carrots and peppers)

recipes.Name: Cooking with kids: Spaghetti & meatballs with hidden veg sauce
Ingredients: 300g good quality  pork sausage (about 4 large or 8 chipolatas)
50g parmesan , finely grated, plus extra to serve

recipes.Name: Sausage & bean casserole
Ingredients: 2 x 400g cans cherry tomatoes or chopped tomatoes
1 x 400g can aduki beans, drained and rinsed

recipes.Name: White velvet soup with smoky almonds
Ingredients: 2 leeks , trimmed so they’re mostly white in colour, washed well, then sliced (about 240g)
2 x 25g slices rye bread , to serve

recipes.Name: Cheesy cauliflower & bacon gratin
Ingredients: 200g smoked  bacon lardons or cubetti di pancetta
100g medium-mature cheddar or gruyère , coarsely grated

recipes.Name: Marmalade & whisky bread & butter pudding
Ingredients: 8 slices day-old crusty white bread , crusts removed
4 tbsp Seville orange marmalade , plus 4 tsp

recipes.Name: Griddle scones with honey
Ingredients: ½ tsp ground  cardamom (about 10 pods, ground)
butter and a honeycomb or jar of honey, to serve

recipes.Name: Mushroom rarebit with mash & thyme gravy
Ingredients: 2 tbsp extra-virgin rapeseed oil or olive oil
2 tsp thyme leaves , plus extra to serve

recipes.Name: Toffee apple bread & butter pudding
Ingredients: 6 brioche finger rolls, sliced into rounds

recipes.Name: Hot chocolate milkshakes
Ingredients: a nip of  rum or brandy for the adults (optional)

recipes.Name: Ultimate toad-in-the-hole with caramelised onion gravy
Ingredients: handful of woody herbs, leaves picked and chopped (we used 6 sage leaves, 4 rosemary sprigs and 4 thyme sprigs), plus a handful, fried until crispy, to serve (optional)
8 fat sausages (we used Cumberland but use your favourite variety)
2 red onions , halved and thinly sliced

recipes.Name: Chocolate gingerbread brownie bars with fudgy icing
Ingredients: 50g dark chocolate , use a bar broken into pieces, or chips
few chunks crystallised ginger , chopped into small pieces

recipes.Name: Fish pie with saffron mash
Ingredients: 200g bag raw, peeled prawn , preferably unfrozen
1 ¼kg potato , cut into large chunks

recipes.Name: Cherry Bakewell sponge pudding
Ingredients: 2 x 425g cans pitted black cherries , in syrup

recipes.Name: Golden veggie shepherd’s pie
Ingredients: 500g pack dried green lentils (we used Merchant Gourmet Puy lentils)
2kg floury potato, such as King Edwards

recipes.Name: Pear parkin pudding with custard
Ingredients: 140g butter , plus extra for the dish and dotting over
140g light muscovado sugar , plus a bit more
2 balls stem ginger from a jar, chopped, plus some of the syrup to serve
4 ripe pears , peeled, stalks cut off, cored and halved

recipes.Name: Brie, ham & fig jam toastie
Ingredients: 1 thick slice of ham (best from the deli counter, or leftover)

recipes.Name: Moroccan harira & chicken soup
Ingredients: 3 tbsp olive oil , plus extra to drizzle
4 fat  celery sticks, chopped into small pieces
3 large carrots , chopped into small pieces
2 big parsnips , peeled and chopped into small pieces
small pack  coriander , stalks finely chopped, leaves reserved to serve
natural yogurt , toast and hummus, to serve

recipes.Name: A good steak & kidney pie
Ingredients: 250g plain flour, plus extra for rolling
1 small egg whisked with 1 tbsp milk, for the egg wash
1 ox kidney, about 400g/14oz, get it fresh from your butcher. Pig's and lamb's kidneys aren't suitable as they only need short cooking
250g flat mushrooms, unpeeled but wiped with a damp cloth
1 large onion, peeled and thickly chopped
50-85g plain flour, depending on how thick you like your gravy
1 tbsp Marigold Swiss vegetable bouillon powder

recipes.Name: Flat apple & vanilla tart
Ingredients: 5 large eating apples  - Cox's, russets or Elstar
3 tsp vanilla sugar or 1 tsp vanilla extract

recipes.Name: Easy chocolate brownie cake
Ingredients: 175g unsalted butter, plus extra for greasing

recipes.Name: Sausage casserole with garlic toasts
Ingredients: 1 tbsp  x 20g pack basil  (use the rest in the toasts)

recipes.Name: Root veg & pancetta toad-in-the-hole with onion gravy
Ingredients: 140g plain flour , plus 2 tbsp for the gravy
4 rosemary sprigs, leaves picked and chopped
600g mixed root vegetable , peeled and cut into wedges or batons (we used carrots, parsnips and beetroot)
2 small  red onions , cut into wedges

recipes.Name: Doughsant
Ingredients: 250g plain flour , plus a little for dusting
300g unsalted butter , cut into cubes and chilled
filling of choice (we used lemon curd but jam, dulce de leche or hazelnut chocolate spread works well)
choice of edible pearl balls or  sprinkles (we used Dr. Oetker)

recipes.Name: Roast aubergine parmigiana
Ingredients: small bunch basil , stalks finely chopped
1 tbsp chopped sundried or semi-dried tomato

recipes.Name: Gratin of fresh & smoked salmon, beetroot, potatoes & dill
Ingredients: green salad or cabbage, to serve

recipes.Name: Bean & sausage hotpot
Ingredients: 8 large sausages (course-cut ones like Toulouse or Cumberland are ideal)
¼ quantity tomato sauce (see 'Goes well with')
1 tbsp black treacle or muscovado sugar

recipes.Name: Caramel pear blondies
Ingredients: 250g unsalted butter , cubed, plus extra for the tin
3 tbsp caramel , from a can or jar

recipes.Name: Creamy chicken, squash & pecan pasta
Ingredients: ½ butternut squash , peeled and chopped into small chunks
25g parmesan grated, plus extra to serve

recipes.Name: Sprout, comté & walnut tart
Ingredients: 100g comté (or vegetarian alternative), grated, plus extra to serve
50g pumpkin seeds , blitzed to a crumb

recipes.Name: Rarebit toasties with sticky Marmite onions
Ingredients: 1 tsp Worcestershire sauce , plus extra to serve
1 tbsp vegetable or rapeseed oil ,  plus extra for the eggs if using

recipes.Name: One-pot paneer curry pie
Ingredients: thumb-sized piece of ginger , finely grated
300g potato , peeled and cut into 2cm cubes
2 large eggs , 1 whole, 1 yolk only, lightly beaten together (freeze the leftover egg white for another recipe)
pilau rice or green veg, to serve

recipes.Name: Italian veggie cottage pie
Ingredients: 16 sundried tomatoes, roughly chopped, plus 1 tbsp of their oil
125g cheddar, grated, plus extra to top

recipes.Name: Next level ratatouille
Ingredients: 3 red peppers , each quartered and deseeded
handful basil , leaves and stalks separated
2 tbsp olive oil , plus extra for frying and drizzling
2 courgettes (different colours are good), roughly chopped

recipes.Name: Triple cheese & aubergine lasagne
Ingredients: 3 large aubergines , cut into small chunks
small handful  basil leaves , finely chopped

recipes.Name: Melty cheese & potato pie
Ingredients: 750g floury potatoes (such as King Edwards), sliced
2 x 375g  blocks of all-butter puff pastry
500g chicory (I used red and white for colour contrast), leaves separated

recipes.Name: Smoky spiced veggie rice
Ingredients: 400g can kidney beans , drained and rinsed
1 tbsp red wine vinegar (vegan varieties are readily available)

recipes.Name: Butternut squash & sage macaroni cheese
Ingredients: 1 large butternut squash, deseeded and cut into chunks
2 tsp olive oil, plus a drizzle
250g pack extra mature or mature cheddar, grated

recipes.Name: Noodles with crispy chilli oil eggs
Ingredients: 2 heads pak choi, each halved through the core
200g cooked noodles (I use straight-to-wok noodles, egg, udon or ramen noodles)
4 small shallots, halved and thinly sliced
1 head of garlic (about 8-10 cloves) thinly sliced
1 thumb-sized piece ginger, peeled, finely chopped

recipes.Name: Squash, chickpea & coconut curry
Ingredients: 1 kabocha, red kuri, crown prince or butternut squash , peeled, deseeded, cut into 2cm-thick slices
1 tbsp dried or fresh curry leaves
1 tbsp roasted curry powder (see recipe, right)
1 tsp turmeric , freshly grated if possible, or use 1 tsp ground
small bunch of  coriander , leaves picked
½ tsp green cardamom pods, seeds only

recipes.Name: Minestrone soup
Ingredients: 2 large potatoes, cut into small dice

recipes.Name: Pumpkin curry with chickpeas
Ingredients: 3 tbsp Thai yellow curry paste, or vegetarian alternative
3 large stalks lemongrass, bashed with the back of a knife
1 piece pumpkin or a small squash (about 1kg)

recipes.Name: Gnocchi & tomato bake
Ingredients: 1 red pepper, deseeded and finely chopped
half a ball mozzarella, torn into chunks

recipes.Name: Spiced lentil & spinach pies
Ingredients: thumb-sized piece of ginger , peeled and finely grated
1 quantity all-butter  pie pastry (see 'Goes well with' below), or use a shop-bought vegetarian alternative

recipes.Name: Coconut, rum & raisin rice pudding
Ingredients: 300ml double cream , plus a little extra

recipes.Name: Frozen pumpkin cheesecake
Ingredients: 350ml maple syrup , plus extra to serve

recipes.Name: Leek, cheese & potato pasties
Ingredients: 2 small leeks , tough outer leaves removed, split in half lengthways and finely sliced
140g/ 5oz Welsh Caerphilly cheese, strong cheddar or vegetarian alternative, cut into small chunks

recipes.Name: Potato curry with lime & cucumber raita
Ingredients: 1 tbsp brown or black mustard seeds
800g potatoes , peeled and cut into very large chunks
chapatis, rotis or naan bread , to serve
½ cucumber , deseeded and coarsely grated
small handful coriander leaves, roughly chopped

recipes.Name: Spiced lentil & butternut squash soup
Ingredients: 1 butternut squash, peeled and cut into 2cm pieces
1 small bunch coriander, leaves chopped, plus extra to serve
dukkah (see tip) and natural yogurt, to serve

recipes.Name: Wild mushroom & chestnut cottage pie
Ingredients: 12 pearl onions , peeled and left whole
1 tsp yeast extract, such as Marmite
500g fresh penny buns/ceps or mixed wild mushrooms , roughly chopped

recipes.Name: Slow cooker ratatouille
Ingredients: 3 courgettes , halved and cut into 2cm pieces
small bunch of basil , roughly chopped, plus a few extra leaves to serve

recipes.Name: Easy pesto lasagne
Ingredients: small pack  basil , leaves chopped, and a few leaves reserved to finish

recipes.Name: Spicy harissa aubergine pie
Ingredients: 1.3kg sweet potatoes, peeled and cut into 3cm chunks

recipes.Name: Pumpkin, cranberry & red onion tagine
Ingredients: 500g/1lb 2oz pumpkin or squash, peeled, deseeded and cut into large chunks
1 tsp each cinnamon , coriander, cumin and harissa paste

recipes.Name: Sweet potato & spinach bake
Ingredients: 300ml single cream (or double cream for a really creamy texture)
850g sweet potatoes, peeled and thinly sliced (about 3mm thick)
25g grated hard cheese, such as cheddar, Parmesan or veggie alternative

recipes.Name: Mixed-bean chilli with wedges
Ingredients: 4 medium baking potatoes, unpeeled, each cut into 8 wedges
2 x 410g/14oz cans mixed pulses in water, rinsed and drained

recipes.Name: Mushroom rarebit with mash & thyme gravy
Ingredients: 2 tbsp extra-virgin rapeseed oil or olive oil
2 tsp thyme leaves , plus extra to serve

recipes.Name: Vegan shepherd's pie
Ingredients: 1.2kg floury potatoes, such as Maris Piper or King Edward
30g dried porcini mushrooms, soaked in hot water for 15 mins, then drained (reserve the liquid)
4 medium carrots (about 300g), cut into small cubes
1 vegetable stock cube (make sure it's vegan - we used Kallo)
1 small butternut squash, peeled and cut into small cubes
½ small pack marjoram or oregano, leaves picked and roughly chopped
½  small pack thyme, leaves picked
½ small pack  sage, leaves picked and roughly chopped

recipes.Name: Cheddar cheese & shallot pie with fennel seed pastry
Ingredients: 140g unsalted butter , plus extra for greasing
2 large King Edward potatoes , cut into small cubes

recipes.Name: Cauliflower, egg & potato curry
Ingredients: 1  plump red chilli , seeds removed if you want, finely chopped
thumb-sized piece of root ginger , peeled and grated
2  large waxy potatoes  (such as Desirée), peeled and cut into bite-sized chunks
2 tbsp curry paste  (Patak's Cumin & chilli is good)
large handful of  roughly chopped fresh coriander

recipes.Name: Indian sweet potato & dhal pies
Ingredients: 650g sweet potatoes , peeled and cut into small chunks
2 carrots , scrubbed, halved and sliced lengthways
good handful coriander , chopped, plus sprigs to serve

recipes.Name: Tomato & onion bake with goat’s cheese
